text: Todd Douglas Self (born November 9, 1978) is a former Major League Baseball first baseman/outfielder. He is 6'5 and weighs 225 pounds. In , he played for the Houston Astros' Double-A affiliate, the Corpus Christi Hooks. He became a free agent at the end of the season. In , he played for the independent St. Paul Saints. ==External links== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Houston Astros players Category:Sportspeople from Shreveport, Louisiana Category:Baseball players from Louisiana Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Auburn Doubledays players Category:Pittsfield Astros players Category:Michigan Battle Cats players Category:Salem Avalanche players Category:Round Rock Express players Category:Trenton Thunder players Category:Norfolk Tides players Category:Corpus Christi Hooks players Category:St. Paul Saints players Category:Shreveport Sports players
title: Todd Self
